name: Reference - Protecting against distributed denial of service attacks - Cisco Technology Inc.
x_kb_abstract: A method for authenticating packet communication traffic includes receiving a data packet sent over a network from a source address to a destination address and reading from the packet a value of a field that is indicative of a number of hops traversed by the packet since having been sent from the source address. The authenticity of the source address is assessed responsive to the value.
x_kb_author: Guy Pazi, Anat Bremler-Bar, Rami Rivlin, Dan Touitou
x_kb_reference_title: Protecting against distributed denial of service attacks
